text: Hagi ana kumapina vahe'ene zagagafanena zamazeri hakare ha'nena mofavrea kasezmante hakare hugahaze. Ana hanugeta tamafahe'i knafima hu'nazaza huta ana mopa mani vinetenage'na, ko knafima osu'noaza hu'na knare'za huramantegahue. E'ina hanugeta Nagrikura Ra Anumza mani'ne huta keta antahita hugahaze.
